name: Silence, Please
description:
Sleep is essential to maintain health and mental balance. Lack of sleep can make you sick and sometimes even death. But what about when you want to sleep and have something that bothers you and doesn't let you sleep? What do you do?

Controls:
Arrows : Walk
Z: Interact
X: Drop


This game was made by two Brazilians: Felipe Inoue and Euler Moisés for Ludum Dare 46.
